page.title: 13SEWSTERN VILLAGE III
page.content: The Village Hall is the main gayhering point which took some 20 years to raise money for, but in 1961 the hall was erected and now holds Bingo, Dances, Wedding Receptions, Civil Aid. The Horticultural Show here is an annual event with a very high standard in garden produce, culinery and craft. Civil Aid is a relative newcomer but about once a year sees an influx of people to take an active part in simulated accident situations to see how the civil aiders can cope. The outer area of the village lhas some fine walks called the Green Lanes. In the season the sound of guns are heard with regular Pheasant shoots. All the aforesaid makes this small rural community a happy one through the efforts of all the villagers for their help and suport of one another enables Sewstern to Flourish.
